nodes.text: Conjeni were sapients who resembled red-furred starfish from the Conjenus system, located in the Mid Rim's Vish sector.

The Conjeni were starfish-shaped sentients covered with reddish fur. They have two eyes on the top-most arm of their bodies, and two large black eyes above a smooth-lipped mouth. The middle two arms serve as normal arms, and end with three thin fingers and a tentacle-like thumb. The lower two arms acted as legs.
The Conjeni hailed from the Conjenus system, located in the Vish sector in the Mid Rim.
Durquist was a Conjeni pilot, and part of Bruce Mercy's pirate band. Along with Morph, Durquist piloted the Starburst during pirate missions.
